descs:
Slugma does not have any blood in its body. Instead, intensely
hot magma circulates throughout this Pokémon's body,
carrying essential nutrients and oxygen to its organs.

Molten magma courses throughout Slugma's circulatory
system. If this Pokémon is chilled, the magma cools and
hardens. Its body turns brittle and chunks fall off, reducing
its size.
